subject: [Haven Inspired] Your Site is Experiencing a Technical Issue
preview: Hey wordpress@haveninspired.com.au,  Thanks for reaching out. We’ve received your ticket and our team is now looking into it.  Just a quick note: due to the holiday season, updates may take a little

action.text: Allie Borcena moved this conversation from the Wolf IQ inbox

full_threads.body:
Hey wordpress@haveninspired.com.au,

Thanks for reaching out. We’ve received your ticket and our team is now looking into it.

Just a quick note: due to the holiday season, updates may take a little longer than usual.

In the event of an emergency, you may contact us by phone at 1300 072 134.

Rest assured, we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

Wishing you a wonderful festive season

G'day!

Since WordPress 5.2 there is a built-in feature that detects when a plugin or theme causes a fatal error on your site, and notifies you with this automated email.

In this case, WordPress caught an error with one of your plugins, Meta pixel for WordPress.

First, visit your website (https://www.haveninspired.com.au/) and check for any visible issues. Next, visit the page where the error was caught (https://www.haveninspired.com.au/wp-admin/admin-post.php) and check for any visible issues.

Please contact your host for assistance with investigating this issue further.

If your site appears broken and you can't access your dashboard normally, WordPress now has a special "recovery mode". This lets you safely login to your dashboard and investigate further.

https://www.haveninspired.com.au/wp-login.php?action=enter_recovery_mode&rm_token=uuixQKgJcgr0EqBjGY9Gvp&rm_key=2PN5VE4y3rmQeo0R144Se4

To keep your site safe, this link will expire in 1 day. Don't worry about that, though: a new link will be emailed to you if the error occurs again after it expires.

When seeking help with this issue, you may be asked for some of the following information:
WordPress version 6.9
Active theme: Breakdance Zero Theme (version 1.0.0)
Current plugin: Meta pixel for WordPress (version 4.1.5)
PHP version 8.1.33



Error Details
=============
An error of type E_ERROR was caused in line 177 of the file /www/haveninspired_233/public/wp-content/plugins/official-facebook-pixel/vendor/facebook/php-business-sdk/src/FacebookAds/Http/Exception/RequestException.php.   thrown
